thread.title: Cho Ramaswamy hospitalized again!
thread.title_full: Cho Ramaswamy hospitalized again! - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Cho Ramaswamy hospitalized again!
text:
Cho Ramaswamy, actor, commentator and political analyst, who was admitted to Apollo Hospitals in Chennai a few months ago, has been hospitalized again. The multifaceted public figure has been admitted due to respiratory problems. Cho, who is receiving treatment in hospital for more than one and a half months, is now said to be in critical condition.
When he was earlier admitted after after he complained of pain on the joints, Ms. Jayalalithaa called on him at the hospital and had a brief interaction with him and enquired about his health. Since January this year, Cho Ramaswamy has been in and out of hospital due to health issues.
